description: Ground flax seed acts as a thickener for the dressing while providing healthy Omega-3 fatty acids.
name: Spicy Carrot Salad
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons fruit vinegar (I used pear vinegar, but apple cider or white wine vinegar will do)
1/2 teaspoon spicy Spanish paprika (or 1/4 teas. paprika plus 1/4 tsp. cayenne)
4 clementines (small seedless oranges, peeled and sectioned)

recipeInstructions.text: Put the ground flax seeds in a small bowl and add the hot water. Stir and allow to sit until thickened, about 5-10 minutes. The add orange juice, vinegar, paprika, and cumin.
Grate the carrots. Put them in a bowl and immediately add the dressing and mix well. Fold in the clementine sections and sprinkle with walnuts. Serve cold or at room temperature.
